Paragraph: The UV - vis absorption spectra of POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers in a chlorobenzene solution or in a thin film state are shown in Figure 1a.

In the given paragraph, the materials mentioned are "POBDTPD" and "PEBDTPD". These are the names of the polymers, and they are mentioned in the context of their UV-vis absorption spectra. Therefore, they are the "Material Name" entities in this paragraph.
